column2: "Na ɔmaa n'enyi do hun ahonyafo a wɔrotow hɔn ayɛyɛdze gu sikakorabea no mu."
"Na ohun kunafo hianyi bi so a ɔbɔtoow mpɛsewamba ebien guu mu."
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Nokwar mese hom dɛ okunafo hianyi yi dze pii ebogu mu akyɛn hɔn nyina."

column2: "Na yinom nyina dza wɔwɔ ma abor hɔn do na wɔdze bi ebogu ayɛyɛdze no mu
column3: na oyi dze
column4: ofi ne hia mu dze n'asetsena a ɔwɔ nyina ebogu mu."

column2: "Na binom reka asɔrfi no ho asɛm
column3: mbrɛ woesi dze abo fɛɛfɛw nye adzekyɛdze ahyehyɛ mu no
column7: nda bɛba a wonnkegya ɔbo kor a ɔda kor do wɔ mu a wonnkodwuruw egu famu."

column2: "Na wobisaa no dɛ
column3: Kyerɛkyerɛnyi

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ yie amma wɔaanndaadaa hom: na dodowara bɛba wɔ me dzin mu dɛ
column6: Aber no abɛn: mma hom nndzi hɔn ekyir."

column2: "Na sɛ hom tse ɔko nye basabasayɛ nka a
column3: mma ɔnnyɛ hom hu; na otwar dɛ yinom dzi kan ba

column2: "Nna ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔman bɔsoɛr ɔman do
column7: na ɔkɔm nye ɔyardɔm bɛba mbeambea
column8: na dza ɔyɛ hu nye nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse befi sor aba."

column2: "Na dza odzi yinom nyina kan nye dɛ wɔdze nsa bosuo hom mu
column3: na wɔahaw hom
column4: dze eyi hom akɔ nhyiamudan mu nye efiadze
column5: na wɔdze hom aba ahemfo nye ambradofo enyim wɔ me dzin ntsi."

column2: "Iyi bɛma hom enya kwan edzi mo ho dase."
"Dɛm ntsi hom mfa nto hom tsirmu mu dɛ hom nnkedzi kan adwendwen dza hom dze beyi hom ano ho:"
"osiandɛ emi na mebɛma hom ano nye nyansa a hom atamfo nyina runntum nngyina enyim
column3: eso worunntua ano."

column2: "Na awofo
column3: nye nuanom
column6: na wɔama woeeku hom mu binom
column8: "na nyimpa nyina bɛtan hom wɔ me dzin ntsi."

column2: "Naaso hom tsinhwi kor mpo nnkɛyew."
"Hom abotar mu na hom bɛgye hom akra."
"Na sɛ hom hu Jerusalɛm dɛ dɔm etwa ho ehyia a
column3: nna hom nhu dɛ ne nsɛɛe abɛn."

column2: "Ɔno na hɔn a wɔwɔ Judea nguan nkɔ nkokwaa do
column3: na wɔmma hɔn a wɔwɔ mu no mfi mu nkɔ
column4: na mma hɔn a wɔwɔ haban mu no nnkɔ mu."

column2: "Na iyi nye awerdzi nda
column3: ma dza wɔakyerɛw nyina aaba mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔafa yafun
column3: nye hɔn a wɔma enumfo wɔ nda no mu ndue! Osiandɛ atseetsee kɛse bɛba asaase no do
column4: na ebufuw bɛba ɔman no mu."

column2: "Na wɔbɔtotɔ nkrantsee anomu
column3: na wɔafa hɔn ndɔmmum akɔ aman nyina do
column4: na amanamamfo betsiatsia Jerusalɛm do ekodu dɛ amanaman aber no bɔso."

column2: "Na nsɛnkyerɛdze bɛba ewia nye bosoom nye nworaba mu
column3: na asaase do amanaman ho bɛhyehye hɔn kɛse
column4: ɔnam po gyigyeegye nye asorɛkye a oruhur ntsi;"

column2: "nyimpa bɔtɔ akɔtɔmborɔnsa wɔ hu nye ndzɛmba a hɔn enyi tua dɛ ɔreba wiadze do ntsi
column3: na ɔsor etum bɔwosow."

column2: "Ɔno na wobohu nyimpa Ba no dɛ ɔreba wɔ nsuwusiw do
column3: wɔ ahoɔdzen nye enyimnyam kɛse mu."

column2: "Na sɛ ndzɛmba yi hyɛ ase reba a
column3: ɔno na hom nhwɛ sor
column4: na hom mma hom tsir do
column5: osiandɛ hom ber a wɔdze bɔpon hom no edu."

column2: "Na obuu hɔn bɛ dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ adɔmbadua nye ndua nyina:"

column2: "sɛ wɔfefɛw na hom hwɛ a
column3: nna homankasa hom nyim dɛ ɔhyewber abɛn."

column2: "Dɛmara na hom so
column3: sɛ hom hu dɛ iyinom rokɔ do a
column4: hom nhu dɛ Nyankopɔn ahendzi no abɛn."

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: Mbasantsen yi runntwa mu nnkɔ gyedɛ ne nyina ayɛ hɔ ansaana."

column2: "Ɔsor nye asaase botwa mu akɔ; naaso me nsɛm dze
column3: wonnkotwa mu akɔ."

column2: "Na hom nhwɛ homho yie
column3: mma etumfursɛm nye asabow nye ɔbra yi ho dadwen aannhyɛ hom akoma do
column4: mma nda no eemmbefir hom awora dɛ mbrɛ efir huan awerɛfir mu:"

column2: "na da no bɛba hɔn a wɔtse asaase do no nyina do."
"Mbom hom nweɔn daa
column3: na hom nsɔr ama hom eenya tum dɛ hom dze befi ndzɛmba yi a ɔbɛba yi nyina nsa
column4: na hom etum egyina nyimpa Ba no enyim."

column2: "Na adzekyee biara nna ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔrfi mu
column3: na anadwe biara nna oepue akɛtsena bepɔw a wɔfrɛ no Ngo Bepɔw do."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo no nyina baa ne nkyɛn anapaatu wɔ asɔrfi mu
column3: dɛ woribetsie no."
